PdfTools.description: Useful to scrape a PDF content.
PdfTools.result: Path to the temporary text file containing the extracted content.
PdfTools.expected_output: Path of the temporary file with scraped content or None if the PDF is corrupted.

ScraperTool.description: Useful to scrape a PDF content.
ScraperTool.result: Text content extracted from the PDF.
ScraperTool.expected_output: Text content scraped from specified pages or None if the PDF is corrupted.

UrlsTool.description: Useful tool to scrap a website content, use to learn more about a given url.
UrlsTool.result: Text content extracted from the webpage.
UrlsTool.expected_output: Text content scraped from the specified URL.

YoutubeTranscriptTool.result: List of text entries from the transcript.
YoutubeTranscriptTool.expected_output: List of transcript text entries or None if there's an error retrieving the transcript.

DuckDuckGoSearchTool.description: Performs a search using DuckDuckGo and returns a list of search results.
DuckDuckGoSearchTool.expected_output: A list of textual search results from DuckDuckGo.
